name: AfterTheDawn
description:
In a parallel world, the world ended, time for technology has ended, now is the time for you to survive.Features
  • Play Online or Offline
  • Play in VR or not
  • Quest with friends or by yourself
  • Offline saves are different than online play and saved via steam cloud.
  • Explore islands and the mainland, looking for the perfect place to be safe.
  • Build a home for yourself or you and your friends.
  • In game shop for cosmetic items, no pay to win stuff at all in the store when it's finished!
